general: Today, the waxing Moon in your sign fosters introspection and emotions. It is an ideal moment to reconnect with your deep needs and to consider positive changes in your life.
love: Express your feelings sincerely to strengthen your relationship.
work: Collaborate with your colleagues, as unity will bring forth new ideas.
health: Take time to rest; a moment of calm is essential.
advice: Listen to your heart and follow your intuition.
teaser: A day to reconnect with yourself!
